## \LaTeX Tips \faStar: Font size

* \small{small} > \footnotesize{footnotesize} > \scriptsize{scriptsize} > \tiny{tiny}
* \normalsize{default}
* \large{large} < \Large{Large} < \LARGE{LARGE} < \huge{huge} < \Huge{Huge}
